subject: Sports Injuries
Baseball
lead_paragraph: In losing their second straight game to the Yankees, the Mets also lost Reyes to tightness in his left hamstring. Reyes will undergo an M.R.I. on Sunday.
snippet: In losing their second straight game to the Yankees, the Mets also lost Reyes to tightness in his left hamstring. Reyes will undergo an M.R.I. on Sunday.
